name: omegoo-workspace
description: Omegoo PWA - Anonymous Chat Platform Workspace

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:shared
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.format:all: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:shared
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build:all && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/build backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules shared/dist shared/node_modules node_modules

author: Omegoo Team
